Summarize an article on climate change. Climate change is a growing global phenomenon and a major environmental challenge facing humanity. Climate change is already occurring and is expected to worsen over the coming decades. Its impacts on humans, ecosystems, and the planet are vast and varied, from more extreme hot and cold temperatures to more extreme weather events such as floods and droughts, to rising sea levels.

Create an outline of the main ideas in this article. The story of Dr. No is the sixth novel by the English author Ian Fleming to feature his British Secret Service agent James Bond. It follows Bond as he investigates the disappearance of two fellow MI6 operatives under the command of the titular Doctor No on his private island in the Caribbean. Along the way, Bond meets Honeychile Rider who is there to collect seashells and they are eventually captured and taken to the Doctor's luxurious facility. The character of Doctor No is inspired by Sax Rohmer's Fu Manchu stories and reception to the novel received mixed reviews in the United Kingdom but better reception in the United States. The novel was adapted into a 1962 movie with Sean Connery in the lead role.
